props.name: url
props.description: The twitter url to be displayed (profile, collection, moment, likes, public list)

props.name: lang
props.description: The language used by the twitter widget (fr, en, es...)

props.name: width
props.description: The width of the widget in px

props.name: height
props.description: The height of the widget in px

props.name: linkColor
props.description: Color used by the widget to render links
